description: brpc is an Industrial-grade RPC framework using C++ Language, which is often used in high performance system such as Search, Storage, Machine learning, Advertisement, Recommendation etc. "brpc" means "better RPC".

End-to-end fraud decisioning and risk scoring framework for credit card transactions, combining machine learning, behavioral risk signals, and operational decision thresholds (approve / review / decline).

AI vs. Human Text Detection Framework A machine learning benchmarking system designed to distinguish between AI-generated and human-written text in Bengali and English. It utilizes novel graph-based feature extraction, rigorous statistical validation, and multi-model benchmarking against state-of-the-art baselines like DetectGPT and Grover.
Autoware-ML is a machine learning framework for multiple tasks, supporting the full lifecycle - training, evaluation, optimization, and deployment of models with native runtime support in Autoware.
The R code for A scalable Bayesian double machine learning framework for high dimensional causal estimation, with application to racial disproportionality assessment

Truth in Listings is a hybrid AI framework that detects fraudulent real estate data by combining machine learning, NLP, image analysis, and rule-based validation. It verifies prices, descriptions, images, and locations to flag fake or misleading listings, improving transparency, trust, and user safety on property platforms globally online
A machine learning framework for predicting hydrolytic degradation kinetics of biodegradable polyesters (PLA, PLGA, PCL, PGA) for biomedical implant applications.

This project implements a market-neutral quantitative equity trading model using daily price data from Indian large-cap stocks. The strategy combines multiple systematic alpha signalsmean reversion, momentum, statistical arbitrage, and machine learningwithin a longshort framework. Risk is controlled using volatility-based position sizing and ATR

A systematic machine learning fairness evaluation framework integrating gender-based data bias quantification and model-level fairness assessment. Tested on 74 disease prediction datasets across 7 machine learning algorithms and 2 fairness metrics, contributing to the development.
Rust bindings for Apple MLX machine learning framework

Retrieve text data from company websites for classification. These steps collectively contribute to a comprehensive framework for classifying companies based on the content of their websites, incorporating web scraping, NLP, machine learning, and visualization techniques.

A simulation-based project that implements a machine learningdriven fault detection and protection framework for a three-phase voltage source inverter using residual current analysis and real-time PWM shutdown logic.

A real-time, microservices-based machine learning trading framework integrating MetaTrader 4/5 via DWX Connect. It ingests DWX tick data, processes them through Kafka streams to generate candles and technical indicators and generates automated trading signals.

Repository for a machine learning framework and proposed empirical equation to predict reinforced concrete beamcolumn joint shear strength. Includes trained models, experimental dataset, and feature analysis for interpretable, practical joint shear assessment.
A Hybrid Machine Learning Framework for Accurate Sales Demanding Forecasting
Impact-induced failure mode prediction of RC beams and columns using a machine learning framework with improved data-algorithm strategies

BioGraphX is a comprehensive framework for extracting biophysical features from protein sequences using graph-theoretical approaches. The system models proteins as interaction networks where residues form nodes and biochemical interactions form edges, enabling sophisticated feature extraction for downstream machine learning applications
Code repository for 'Machine Learning based framework for Drone Detection and Identification using RF signals'
A Robust Computational Framework for Satellite-Derived Bathymetry Integrating Machine Learning with Spatio-Temporal Generative Diffusion Models

This project develops a machine learning framework to predict MIC and ZOI of antimicrobial nanoparticles using simulated XRD data. The Voting Regressor model achieved R > 0.97, with key features like crystallite size being crucial for antimicrobial efficacy. It enables high-throughput virtual screening for nanoparticle optimization.
A Hybrid Physics-Informed Machine Learning (PIML) System for Iraqi Concrete Optimization. Integrating DoE, Transfer Learning, and Lean Six Sigma for Engineering Certainty. [Phase 1: EDA]

Pre-exposure risk assessment for SARS-CoV-2 using Serum protein  biomarkers. Machine learning framework (KNN+GA) with 5-protein panel.  Dual validation: LOOCV internal + independent external cohort.  Python implementation.

Codebase for an XGBoost machine-learning framework applied to biomass estimation. The repository provides preprocessing routines, model training and tuning scripts, performance evaluation, and reproducible workflows supporting the published study.
AI/ML poisoning attack research | Adversarial machine learning | NullSec Framework | @AnonAntics

Experimental framework and Bayesian machine learning pipeline for estimating soil Volumetric Water Content (VWC) using passive UHF RFID technology. Includes physics-informed preprocessing, statistical modeling (Bayesian regression), and sensor data analysis for indirect sensing in smart agriculture and IoUT contexts.

A multifaceted framework for analysing, modeling, and managing credit risk, combining data engineering, statistical modeling, decision logic, and machine learning to support accurate risk assessment, monitoring, and smarter lending strategies
The Career Guidance Framework is a system that recommends suitable career paths for students based on their skills, academic performance, and interests using a machine learning approach.
Attempt at Porting LTX-2 Video Model to Apple's MLX Machine Learning Framework
A Python framework for NIR spectral analysis that preprocesses spectra (SG, SNV, MSC) and applies machine learning models (PLS, SVM, 1D CNN) for classification and regression.

Explainable machine learning framework for detecting illicit activities across Bitcoin and Ethereum. Achieves F scores of 0.92-0.985 while maintaining full interpretability through SHAP, CIU and DEXiRE methods. GDPR and EU AI Act compliant. Built for fraud investigators, regulators and AML compliance teams.
Earth observation processing framework for machine learning in Python
This study presents a machine learningbased framework for classifying pore-scale flow geometries as simple or complex using simulation-derived geometric and velocity features.

Heart disease classification project using a dataset of 920 patient records. Evaluates ML and deep learning models including Logistic Regression, SVM, Random Forest, XGBoost, LightGBM, CatBoost, and TabNet. CatBoost achieved the best results, with SHAP analysis used to interpret key clinical features.
An R Shiny-based framework for pilot workload monitoring using multi-modal biometric fusion and Machine Learning
The PennyLane-Qulacs plugin integrates the Qulacs quantum computing framework with PennyLane's quantum machine learning capabilities.
RSRP Prediction Using a Hybrid FriisMachine Learning Framework

The End-to-End MLOps Pipeline is a production-grade framework built for the modern AI stack. It solves the critical problem of "Model Rot" by providing a structured, automated environment for training, deploying, and monitoring machine learning models with industry-leading efficiency.

SAFER-6G : Framework IA pour la scurit des rseaux 6G. Le projet utilise le Machine Learning pour analyser le trafic rseau simul, dtecter les cyberattaques en temps rel (dbit, latence, etc.), et prsenter les alertes sur un tableau de bord interactif.
A comprehensive tabular data synthesis framework for automated machine learning, featuring advanced genetic algorithms and hyperparameter optimization for generating high-quality synthetic datasets.

Le Framework XFL reprsente un logiciel qui va permettre de faire varier les paramtres d'experimentation, les mtriques de mesure, dployer et  visualiser les rsultats dun algorithme de machine learning distribu (XFL) sur des  nuds rels.
This repository presents AuDaCE (Audio Dataset Controlled Environment), a framework aiming at simplifying the management of machine learning datasets based on audio.

Coleo de projetos prticos e estudos que documentam meu aprendizado contnuo em desenvolvimento de software, desde, estudos e experimentos em linguagens de programao, frameworks, machine learning, boas prticas de desenvolvimento e outros.
A comprehensive ranking and evaluation framework for machine learning models and algorithms

Modular backtesting framework for algorithmic trading using Backtrader. Features a 4-phase state machine strategy, JPY pair P&L correction (ERIS logic), and professional reporting. Educational resource for learning systematic trading.
dgbpy is a framework for research and deployment of machine learning models from seismic and well data.
A Python-based backtesting framework comparing HODL, DCA, and a 10-factor quantitative strategy on 14 years of Bitcoin data, demonstrating the risks of overfitting in financial machine learning.

Quantrisk-ML is a Python-based framework combining machine learning (LSTM, Random Forest) with quantitative finance to analyze portfolio risk, forecast returns, compute VaR, run Monte Carlo simulations, and stress-test scenarios for data-driven financial insights.

This project presents an AI-powered cybersecurity framework designed to protect critical infrastructure systems (such as energy, transportation, healthcare, and government networks) by combining threat intelligence, real-time attack detection, and digital forensics analysis.  The framework leverages machine learning and automated analytics
Explainable AI (XAI) framework designed to provide transparent, interpretable insights for both tabular and image-based machine learning models.

An end-to-end machine learning framework for detecting cyberattacks in smart traffic/IoT networks using optimized Random Forest models with SHAP and LIME explainability. Includes full preprocessing, training, validation protocol, evaluation, and Google Colab compatibility with Drive integration.
TAK-ML - A machine learning framework for use with the TAK ecosystem (specifically ATAK and TAK Server at the moment)

RESTful API for vector similarity search. It uses the Python web framework FastAPI and a REDIS vector database.  This accelerates machine learning workflows that require vector similarity search using classification models.

flowMagic is an R package for automated bivariate gating of flow cytometry (FCM) data. It uses a machine-learning model trained on both experts data and a large, high-quality FCM dataset generated by EVE Online players. The package also provides an extensive visualization toolkit and integrates seamlessly with the flowCore/flowWorkspace frameworks
A unified framework for machine learning with time series
Machine Learning Framework for Protein-Protein Interaction Prediction

This repository contains a credit risk model validation framework using machine learning techniques such as XGBoost. The focus is on testing the models performance consistency over different datasets and assessing the stability of the model's features over time through Population Stability Index (PSI).

This project implements an emotion and context-aware recommendation system that enhances traditional recommendation approaches by incorporating user emotions and situational context. Using a hybrid machine learning framework, the system adapts recommendations dynamically to deliver more relevant, personalized, and human-centric suggestions.

This project is a Smart Home Energy Saving application designed to optimize energy consumption in smart homes. It is built using a combination of machine learning models and generative AI, leveraging a multi-agent framework (Microsoft Agent Framework).
A machine learningdriven framework to analyze and classify internal migration patterns in India using Aadhaar address update data.
Badr is a framework for training fair machine-learning models that minimize a chosen fairness metric while preserving Pareto-optimal performance across sensitive groups.
Real-time Federated Data Platform Harnessing Machine Learning for Adaptive Intelligent Workflow Optimization Framework
An open-source Python framework for hybrid quantum-classical machine learning.

Mobility-aware wireless path loss modeling framework integrating 3GPP-compliant channel models, realistic mobility, and symbolic regression with Kalman and Markov features to generate high-fidelity, machine-learning-ready datasets for next-generation wireless networks.

A reproducible machine learning framework to study cancer drug resistance by integrating DepMap molecular profiles and PRISM drug response data, with a focus on interpretable models and in-silico drug repurposing.
ids project by using ml approach

project builds dual purpose predictive framework for the state of Uttarakhand India to help both hospitals and health departments.The first part predicts a patients chance of being readmitted within 30 days of discharge by combining medical data with social factors.The second part maps disease risk across districts considering seasonal patterns

A data miningbased heart disease prediction system developed under the Complex Engineering Problem (CEP) framework, combining supervised machine learning models with explainable AI (SHAP) to ensure transparent and interpretable healthcare predictions.

A custom machine learning framework built from scratch in C while learning core AI and ML concepts. Implements data processing, encoding, mathematical operations, and model logic without third-party or prebuilt ML libraries. Focused on low-level understanding, memory management, performance optimization, and scalable ML systems.
Machine Learning

Mapping Alternate Scenarios of Forest Intactness (MASFI) is a cloud-based machine learning framework. It uses XGBoost regression and remote sensing data such as GEDI LiDAR to create high-resolution maps and statistics, supporting protected area planning and management.
multiple machine learning and deep learning practice projects and framework practice repo

Developed a hybrid ensemble machine learning framework to assess climate change impacts on agricultural productivity by integrating climate, soil, remote sensing, and crop yield data.Random Forest, GBDT, LSTM, TCN, and Bayesian Neural Networks used for robust and uncertainty-aware forecasting.
Modeltime unlocks time series forecast models and machine learning in one framework

Validation-driven machine learning framework where scientific constraints act as adaptive validators rather than fixed physics losses. Demonstrated on a climate downscaling example to contrast against PINN-style constraint enforcement

Machine learningbased inverse kinematics pipeline for robotic manipulators. The project uses neural networks, forward kinematicsaware loss functions, and joint constraints to predict joint angles from end-effector poses. Designed as a modular and research-oriented framework.
An uncertainty-aware evaluation framework for healthcare machine learning, focusing on risk-aware decision support beyond accuracy or
Machine learning framework for real-time cancer risk prediction with adaptive self-training feedback.
A versatile local LLM framework for chat, image, video, machine learning modelling, speech, and automation
MLimputer: Missing Data Imputation Framework for Machine Learning

Health Insurance Cost Prediction App  This web app, which is built with the Streamlit web development framework, uses a machine learning regression algorithm for the purpose of health insurance cost predictions, taking into consideration the personal and lifestyle characteristics of the individual.
Distributed service framework using asynchronous messages supporting IoT, Machine Learning and Video

My portfolio showcases projects in data analysis and data science, with emphasis on statistical analysis, machine learning models, and applied analytics. I develop data-driven solutions using Python and analytical frameworks, focusing on reliability, interpretability, and real-world applicability across different domains.
MULTI-evolve: a machine learning-guided end-to-end framework for engineering hyperactive multi-mutant proteins

This project is a comprehensive framework for detecting network anomalies (specifically DoS/SYN Flooding) in IoT environments. It leverages Software-Defined Networking (SDN) for traffic monitoring and a K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN) machine learning model to improve detection accuracy and false alarm reduction
A Python framework to predict machine learning model failures using uncertainty estimation and confidence analysis
Digital Materials Discovery Framework -  Integrating Computational Materials Modelling, Digitalisation of Materials Data, Machine Learning and Semantics  for accelerated Discovery of Materials
AI-based Weather Forecasting System using Machine Learning (Random Forest) and Django web framework with real-time data integration.
Empower machines to reason about affordances in new environments with A4-Agent's advanced zero-shot learning framework.
This repository seeks to leverage machine learning frameworks to tackle Valley Fever disease. Goal is to identify compounds that inhibit the disease.
A data-driven framework for customer segmentation and early-risk prediction using transactional data, RFM analysis, and machine learning. This repository supports an academic research study.

Financial Signal Intelligence using Machine Learning and MLOps End-to-end framework for financial time series analysis using signal decomposition, technical indicators and ensemble learning. Includes a Flask-based API for real-time inference and a Next.js frontend for visualization and interaction.
Translation exploration with Transformers and Machine Learning Experimentation Platfroms

This repository contains the group project for the Machine Learning for Networking (ML4N) course. The project focuses on analyzing 230,000+ unique Unix shell attacks captured in a honeypot environment. By leveraging NLP techniques (TF-IDF, BoW) and ML, we aim to automatically identify attacker intents based on the MITRE ATT&CK framework.
A generic, sklearn-compatible machine learning experimentation framework designed for rapid prototyping and systematic model evaluation.

This study proposes a machine learning approach to predict mechanical and biological performance of 3D bioprinted scaffolds using printing parameters and bio-ink features, enabling improved scaffold design and optimization.

A curated collection of advanced satellite image analysis projects, frameworks, and tools  focused on reconstruction, enhancement, interpretation, and machine learning workflows for remote sensing data.
a small machine learning framework implemented from scratch
